page.title: 02State & Private Schools,Oxon
page.content: The difference between State and Private Schools is that the government pays for State schools but parents of private pupils pay the school.We of St. Gregory's State school visited the Dragon Private school. Dragon pupils have 3 science laboratories while we have 1.They take biology and physics/chemistry separately while we have science.They also take History and Geography whereas we have "Social Studies". Our English is streamed,theirs is not. We start to learn French at the age of 11.They start at 7.They choose Greek or German at 10.Music and Art&Craft in our school have a large room each,while they have several rooms for each.They have separate lessons for Art,Craft, Wood/Metalwork.St.Gregory's has an all-in-one lesson.
